definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Ship of the Lines were the quintessential battleship of the era.
sentences.chinese: 重型战列舰是巨舰时代的精粹之作。

sentences.english: One more example, Peking opera is the national essence of our culture.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个例子，京剧是文化的精粹。

sentences.english: The crater is the essence of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 恩戈罗恩戈罗火山口是非洲精粹。

sentences.english: The culture here has been refined over thousands of years of continuous civilization.
sentences.chinese: 中国有几千年持续的文明沉淀下来的文化精粹。

sentences.english: The delicacies of Phoenix in Hunan are fastidious about color, flavor, and taste as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 湖南凤凰人在饮食方面十分讲究精粹，注重色香味全。

definition: best feature/most important part of an object/quintessence/essence/soul
to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
lit. spirit and marrow/the essential character
collecting together (of distinguished people or exquisite objects)/to gather/to assemble
